sql.content: create table tb_communication ( id_ integer primary key autoincrement, id varchar(100), content text, type varchar(50), from varchar(50), to varchar(50), create_date varchar(20) )

create table tb_inspection ( id_ integer primary key autoincrement, plan_id varchar(100), plan_name varchar(500), send_man varchar(50), create_date varchar(20), last_modify_date varchar(20), plan_date varchar(20), finish_date varchar(20), room_name varchar(500), lock_mac varchar(50), user_job_number varchar(20) )

create table tb_inspection_item ( id_ integer primary key autoincrement, item_id varchar(100), item_name varchar(500), item_cate_name varchar(500), equipment_name varchar(500), cabinet_name varchar(500), cabinet_lock_mac varchar(50), create_date varchar(20), last_modify_date varchar(20), inspection_id integer )
